options.msgImportConfig: This will overwrite the existing configuration file and this action is not undoable, sure about this?
options.msgNotFound: Please add a new rule, or import an existing configuration file (in JSON format), otherwise this extension will not do anything.
options.msgCssSelector: The <code/> field uses the <link/> syntax to specify the element to be tagged on the page.
options.msgDoNotModify: If you are not familiar with the CSS selector syntax, please do not modify this field, as this may invalidate the extension.
options.msgBodySelector: Most sites can specify this field as <code/>, which adds furigana to Japanese text on most pages.
options.msgSelectorMerge: The <codeSelector/> fields are separated by comma, and selectors corresponding to the same <codeDomain/> will be merged directly.
options.msgDeleteRule: The deletion rule is not undoable, sure about this?
